title: Powell says Fed has made 'quite a bit of progress' on inflation but needs more confidence before cutting
content: "We've made quite a bit of progress and in bringing inflation back down to our target," Powell said at a central banking forum in Sintra, Portugal.
summary: "We've made quite a bit of progress and in bringing inflation back down to our target," Powell said at a central banking forum in Sintra, Portugal.

title: 'It's not just Taylor Swift': ECB's Lagarde says Eras Tour is not alone in keeping euro zone inflation high
content: European Central Bank President Christine Lagarde said that Taylor Swift's Eras Tour is not alone in keeping inflation high across the euro zone.
summary: European Central Bank President Christine Lagarde said that Taylor Swift's Eras Tour is not alone in keeping inflation high across the euro zone.

title: France's Macron made key mistakes and demonized the left, says bestselling economist Thomas Piketty
content: Thomas Piketty, bestselling French economist, pointed to what he described as one of Macron's biggest mistakes: neglecting and demonizing France's left wing.
summary: Thomas Piketty, bestselling French economist, pointed to what he described as one of Macron's biggest mistakes: neglecting and demonizing France's left wing.

title: Greece becomes first EU country to introduce a six-day working week
content: Greece has introduced a six-day working week for some businesses, seeking to boost productivity and employment in the southern European country.
summary: Greece has introduced a six-day working week for some businesses, seeking to boost productivity and employment in the southern European country.

title: First House Democrat urges Biden to withdraw from presidential race
content: Rep. Lloyd Doggett is the first sitting House Democrat to formally call on President Joe Biden to drop his reelection bid against former President Donald Trump.
summary: Rep. Lloyd Doggett is the first sitting House Democrat to formally call on President Joe Biden to drop his reelection bid against former President Donald Trump.

title: Tesla shares soar 10% on better-than-expected Q2 deliveries report
content: Tesla's delivery numbers for the second quarter beat Wall Street estimates.
summary: Tesla's delivery numbers for the second quarter beat Wall Street estimates.

title: Peloton staved off the cash crunch that threatened its business. Where does it go now?
content: Peloton's looming debt pile raised concerns that the company could be pushed into bankruptcy. Now that Peloton has refinanced, it still has to fix its strategy.
summary: Peloton's looming debt pile raised concerns that the company could be pushed into bankruptcy. Now that Peloton has refinanced, it still has to fix its strategy.

title: FDA approves Eli Lilly Alzheimer’s drug, expanding treatment options in the U.S.
content: It's a long-awaited win for Eli Lilly after donanemab faced several delays in its path to the market, including an initial rejection from the FDA last year.
summary: It's a long-awaited win for Eli Lilly after donanemab faced several delays in its path to the market, including an initial rejection from the FDA last year.

title: Enough is enough: Japanese airlines clamp down on abusive travelers
content: Amid rising uncivility, Japan Airlines and All Nippon Airways outline the behaviors that constitute "customer harassment" of their staff members.
summary: Amid rising uncivility, Japan Airlines and All Nippon Airways outline the behaviors that constitute "customer harassment" of their staff members.

title: China's young people are 'revenge saving' even as Gen Zers around the world are piling up debt
content: Rather than splurging on impulsive purchases, China's young are saving ferociously as the world's second-largest economy remains in the doldrums.
summary: Rather than splurging on impulsive purchases, China's young are saving ferociously as the world's second-largest economy remains in the doldrums.

title: Trump sentencing date in hush money case postponed more than two months to Sept. 18
content: Trump's lawyers sought to challenge the hush money verdict after the Supreme Court ruled that ex-presidents have “presumptive immunity” for their official acts.
summary: Trump's lawyers sought to challenge the hush money verdict after the Supreme Court ruled that ex-presidents have “presumptive immunity” for their official acts.

title: What a new Labour government will mean for the UK's foreign policy
content: The incoming U.K. government will confront a complex international landscape once Britons head to the polls on July 4.
summary: The incoming U.K. government will confront a complex international landscape once Britons head to the polls on July 4.

title: History suggests bitcoin will likely hit a new all-time high this year, report says
content: Bitcoin has not reached the top of its current cycle and is likely to go past its all-time high this year, according to a research report by CCData.
summary: Bitcoin has not reached the top of its current cycle and is likely to go past its all-time high this year, according to a research report by CCData.

title: Markets will be 'upset' if new French government does not commit to fiscal rules, European Central Bank's vice-president says
content: "What we have seen so far is that the evolution of [French] markets has been quite orderly," the vice president of the European Central Bank told CNBC.
summary: "What we have seen so far is that the evolution of [French] markets has been quite orderly," the vice president of the European Central Bank told CNBC.

title: How thousands of Americans got caught in fintech’s false promise and lost access to bank accounts
content: The Synapse collapse has revealed fintech's promise of safety as a mirage. More than 100,000 Americans with $265 million in deposits were locked from accounts.
summary: The Synapse collapse has revealed fintech's promise of safety as a mirage. More than 100,000 Americans with $265 million in deposits were locked from accounts.

title: GM reports best U.S. quarterly sales since 2020
content: Electric vehicle deliveries increased 40% compared to a year earlier to 21,930 units. Still, EVs made up only 3.2% of GM's total second-quarter sales.
summary: Electric vehicle deliveries increased 40% compared to a year earlier to 21,930 units. Still, EVs made up only 3.2% of GM's total second-quarter sales.

title: Media mogul Barry Diller weighs a bid to gain control of Paramount
content: Barry Diller's IAC is weighing an offer for Shari Redstone's National Amusements Inc., which would give the media mogul control of Paramount.
summary: Barry Diller's IAC is weighing an offer for Shari Redstone's National Amusements Inc., which would give the media mogul control of Paramount.

title: Hungary’s Prime Minister Orban — a key Putin ally — makes first wartime visit to Ukraine
content: Hungarian Prime Minister Viktor Orban is widely viewed as Russia's closest ally within the European Union and is a vocal critic of NATO's support for Kyiv.
summary: Hungarian Prime Minister Viktor Orban is widely viewed as Russia's closest ally within the European Union and is a vocal critic of NATO's support for Kyiv.

title: Iran faces runoff election between reformist and ultra-conservative presidential candidates amid record low turnout
content: Amid record-low voter turnout of around 40% in the election's first round Friday, two dramatically different candidates came out on top.
summary: Amid record-low voter turnout of around 40% in the election's first round Friday, two dramatically different candidates came out on top.

title: Euro zone inflation eases to 2.5% as core print misses estimate
content: Economists polled by Reuters expected the headline rate to come in at 2.5%.

title: A phobia specialist shares his 3 top tips to overcome any fear from spiders to public speaking

title: Millennials are ‘very ill-prepared’ to be the richest generation in history, wealth manager says

title: Chinese EV companies Zeekr and Nio report record deliveries in June

title: Collapsed bitcoin exchange Mt. Gox is about to unload $9 billion of coins onto the market. Here's what it means

title: Chewy shares fall nearly 7% as the boost from Roaring Kitty's new stake diminishes
content: The filing showed Roaring Kitty, whose legal name is Keith Gill, bought just over 9 million shares — amounting to a 6.6% stake in the company.
summary: The filing showed Roaring Kitty, whose legal name is Keith Gill, bought just over 9 million shares — amounting to a 6.6% stake in the company.

title: After France's right-wing surge, parties seen scrambling to block a National Rally win
content: Left-wing and centrist parties in France are scrambling to block the far-right National Rally from winning the ongoing parliamentary snap election.

title: Inside Starbucks' plans to improve stores for customers and baristas

title: 'NEETS' and 'new unemployables' — why some young adults aren’t working
content: Although the overall unemployment rate is just 4%, there is a growing share of young adults not working — by choice or by force.
summary: Although the overall unemployment rate is just 4%, there is a growing share of young adults not working — by choice or by force.

title: Google invests in BlackRock-backed Taiwanese solar developer to boost energy capacity amid AI boom
content: Google announced it is partnering with BlackRock to develop a 1-gigawatt pipeline of new solar capacity in Taiwan.
